Thank you for your application for the Summer Internship with the GLA!
Your application has been received successfully. All applications are currently being reviewed and an interview shortlist will be confirmed by the end of May. If your application is succesful, GLA will contact you in the first week of June.
Dates for your diary If you are successful in reaching the next stage of this process, you will be invited to an interview. The interviews will be on 30th June and 1st July. Interested in furthering your knowledge of career opportunities and learning from business leaders?
Team London would love to invite you to a fantastic professional development opportunity! They are kicking off National Volunteer’s Week 2016 with a high profile ‘Run to do Good’ event, with the charity partner GoodGym. 100+ volunteer runners will run between 1 to 3km from City Hall to a wide range of volunteering opportunities! Please note: This event is an additional opportunity, it is not linked to the GLA Internship.
https://gallery.mailchimp.com/b4c72e4aa8c7dff475317eee1/files/GLAInterntoptipsapplicationassessmentinterview.docx.pdf
About the event A team of business volunteers will run to City Hall to share their personal careers experience with a group of HeadStart Gradutes! Including information about their roles, their own career journeys, and a chance to ask employment related questions.
Wednesday 1st June 10.30-12.30 City Hall, The Queens Walk London SE1 2A
Refreshments will be provided Interested? Let us know here! (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1UBaRFCZ_hzDQU4-coeECWHnG-g1Kj-IxVffSSEr96Qs/viewform)
Any questions? Email michael.tutton@the-challenge.org
We look forward to seeing you there!
